function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Direct association between crowding and negative health outcomes, including infectious diseases like tuberculosis and COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases and related health issues, as well as mental health problems","Mitigation":"Adopt targeted strategies and appropriate design solutions for living spaces to ensure health, accessibility, and internal flexibility","Technologies":"Smart design solutions, spatial optimization technologies","People":"Residents, especially in overcrowded living spaces","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, policymakers"},{"Description":"Inadequate spaces accentuate health risks and interfere with productivity in remote working and school performances","Impact":"Health risks are accentuated, and productivity in remote working and school performance is hindered","Mitigation":"Ensure appropriate room size and flexibility of living spaces to accommodate changing needs and maintain productivity","Technologies":"Flexible room design, technology-enabled remote working solutions","People":"Residents, employers, educators","Owner":"Architects, employers, educators"},{"Description":"Lack of flexibility in co-housing or condominium areas hinders adaptation to increased need for space and social distancing","Impact":"Inability to easily adapt living spaces for increased space and social distancing, potentially violating regulatory requirements","Mitigation":"Ensure maximum flexibility of living spaces in co-housing or condominium areas to easily adapt to changing needs and maintain compliance with regulatory requirements","Technologies":"Modular design, adjustable partitioning systems","People":"Residents in shared housing, condominium associations, regulatory authorities","Owner":"Architects, condominium associations, regulatory authorities"}]}
